title: Head
post:
{{Sidebar("Glossary")}}

The **Head** is the part of an {{glossary("HTML")}} document that contains {{glossary("metadata")}} about that document, such as author, description, and links to {{glossary("CSS")}} or {{glossary("JavaScript")}} files that should be applied to the HTML.

## See also

- {{htmlelement("head")}} element reference on Es Solution
- [What's in the head? Web page metadata](/blog/Learn_web_development/Core/Structuring_content/Webpage_metadata) on the Es Solution Learning Area
